title: Bug 121527new feature: Cache data set data for report preview works incorrectly
description: Bug 121527new feature: Cache data set data for report preview works incorrectly
OB: But in the preview result of "Edit dataset" dialog, it returns the entire dataset.Expected result:Return 5 rows for preview.
SR: Description:Set the "Cache and use first 5 rows" for report preview, but in the preview result and preview in designer there still return the entire data set.Steps to reproduce:1.Create sample datasource, create a dataset with "selectfrom CLASSICMODELS.CUSTOMERS".2.In the "Edit dataset" dialog, set the "Cache and use first 5 rows" for report preview.
